headline: How the Narrative for Lululemon Is Evolving Amid Analyst Downgrades and Execution Risks
summary: Analysts have recently nudged their consensus price target for lululemon athletica stock slightly lower, moving from $206.17 to $202.60. This nearly flat adjustment reflects cautious sentiment as the brand contends with negative U.S. sales growth, intensified competition, and a lack of fresh product innovation. Stay tuned to discover how to track these shifting narratives and stay ahead of important developments for lululemon investors. What Wall Street Has Been Saying Recent analyst coverage...

headline: lululemon: A Good Time To Start Accumulating
summary: lululemon athletica shows strong global growth, no debt, and attractive valuation despite U.S. softness and tariff concerns. Find out why LULU stock is a buy.
